location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage; the date and the body of the letter on f. 75v have been almost entirely obscured, which makes the text difficult to read.

mods.abstract: The letter concerns an envoy to the Court of Persia for which the Resident confirms he will follow all related instructions.The dates of the surrounding correspondence suggests that the date of this letter is very likely to be the 15 February 1808.
